You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesJ J] > &jsercy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Jsercy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0408/index.htm U+00408].
  * `&jsercy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0458/index.htm U+00458].
